title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot pane.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN flows.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Community-maintained NestJS module wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama sidecar containers in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB in Python.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# client for .NET 6+ with chat & generate async methods.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing private Ollama LLM into company workspaces.
